name: Drift King 3D
description:
Drift King is a mobile endless runner with a twist. You play as a car and you only have two controls - Drift Left, or Drift Right. Make it as far as you can, use powerups and collect coins to upgrade your car and go faster!

Controls

  • Tap the Left side of the screen to drift Left.
  • Tap the Right side of the screen to drift Right.
  • Thats it!

Installation

On any Android Device you should be able to download the APK file attached and then run it to install the app.

If this does not work you may need to use an APK installer app which you can just download off of the Google Play Store.
